Dear Sagar,

 

Thanks and appreciate it.

 

To protect our insured’s interest, we encourage your team to send immediately notice of loss against the forwarders, carriers, and agents as soon as your team/warehouse team is made aware of the loss. This will help us determine the exact location where the loss happened, and this will help us mitigate the loss through recovery.

 

Moving forward, we are pleased to offer the below:

Damaged and shortage to cargo:               USD 1,337.60 / AED 4,908.99

Less Excess:                                                         AED 200.00

Net Settlement:                                                AED 4,708.99

 

Please proceed with the destruction of the below cargo and provide supporting photographs in order to release the Discharge.

o protect our insured’s interest, we encourage your team to send immediately notice of loss against the forwarders, carriers, and agents as soon as your team/warehouse team is made aware of the loss. This will help us determine the exact location where the loss happened, and this will help us mitigate the loss through recovery.

 

Moving forward, we are pleased to offer the below:

Damaged and shortage to cargo:               USD 1,337.60 / AED 4,908.99

Less Excess:                                                         AED 200.00

Net Settlement:                                                AED 4,708.99

 

Please proceed with the destruction of the below cargo and provide supporting photographs in order to release the Discharge.

*	2 pcs CHN Allure Sport Extreme EDTC 50ML
*	20 pcs Coco Mademoiselle EDP 100 ML
*	1 pc CRAY LVRE Berry

 

Please share the photos via WeTransfer.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar
